name: MPSImagePyramid
desc: A base class for creating different kinds of pyramid images.

items.name: init(device: MTLDevice)
items.desc: Initializes a downwards 5-tap image pyramid with the default filter kernel and device.

items.name: init(device: MTLDevice, centerWeight: Float)
items.desc: Initialize a downwards 5-tap image pyramid with a central weight parameter and device.

items.name: init(device: MTLDevice, kernelWidth: Int, kernelHeight: Int, weights: UnsafePointer<Float>)
items.desc: Initialize a downwards n-tap image pyramid with a custom filter kernel and device.

items.name: var kernelWidth: Int
items.desc: The width of the filter window. Must be an odd number.

items.name: var kernelHeight: Int
items.desc: The height of the filter window. Must be an odd number.
